text: Ana mba vuzvuk ana kim, Sor ana zɨ mbe khare, Por, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar ana rugap ki. Ana purara Erimas garav, khaŋ ana nzuai. 13.9 Kha zɨ Sor, ana Hibruin kaman zɨ ma. Por, ana Grikin kaman zɨ ma. Mbe gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Sor Fhe Bakɨmen ŋaara mbua ruav, nduara kha zɨn wo tɨgi, Por. Ana khaŋ muuŋgiap, ana mba Grikin kama nzuai gumgi gu mbigi phorga ŋgari.
